author: UltPanda
install_msg: Thank you for installing QOTD! Configure the channel using `[p]qotd setchannel` and select a theme with `[p]qotd settheme`. Enjoy engaging your community with thought-provoking questions!
name: QOTD
short: A themed Question of the Day cog.
description: Automatically posts themed questions of the day to keep your community engaged. Includes GitHub integration and reaction-based engagement.
